inputs.text: The Transformer architecture, introduced in the paper 'Attention is All You Need', revolutionized natural language processing. It uses self-attention mechanisms to process sequences in parallel, unlike recurrent neural networks which process sequentially. This parallel processing enables faster training and better performance on long-range dependencies.

expected_outputs.summary: Transformers use self-attention for parallel sequence processing, improving NLP performance
